features: Take actionwith 50+ science-based exercises (CBT, mindfulness and ACT).; Earn badgesand level up, making your journey rewarding and motivating.; Track your mood, emotions, and mental health, all in MoodOS.; Choose from10 in-built diary entry prompts like Gratitude, Dream Journal and more.; Be guidedto Ask the right questions about the challenges holding you back.; Clip useful contentyou keep scrolling through, but doing nothing about.; Track your progresswith detailed graphs and insights, to see how far you've come.; Talk to Notion AI like a personal therapist, using custom prompts.; Much more..
